content: Hi AngelHeart Sorry if the post offended you. I am not condemning her. I get she was young and made a mistake. I certainly don't want her to go to the devil. I know she loves her little baby even though times will be tough. I am sure the ex is not a cute as he was to her back then, yes? Having said that, when she herself continues to be in the media and tell her story then she becomes a topic of conversation. The topic itself bring passion from both sides as I can tell from your post. Anyway, it was not meant from me to be vicious, only to discuss the topic. That is how you might be able to find a middle ground to the subject, if both sides keep talking.

Sounds like maybe she needs to give this baby up for adoption to someone that will love it and be happy for it's birth. And this is important how? The poor girl is not a politician. Her mother is yesterday's news to everyone outside of Alaska. This is nothing but muckraking of the lowest sort.
reply: She's not a politician but since she is in time magazine that makes her somewhat of a Celebrity doesn't it? If she does not want to be in the lime light she shouldn't place herself there.
title: Bristol Palin Seems to Regret Having A baby

On one hand, I guess it is nice she wants to try and tell young girls that it was not the right thing to do and how hard it is blah blah blah But that has been said for years and when her mother said it to her, she sure did not listen and unfortunately, many young people wont. Anyway, I think she did not help her mother, she should just be humble, hush up and stay off the tv as should her ex. My feelings exactly.
